nodes.text: Count Alde was a Human male who was a member of the noble House Alde on the planet Alderaan during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the Sith Empire. Alde co-funded the Republic's work on the Death Mark laser, though the Mirialan spy Aleyna Hark tagged the Count with the superweapon's targeting device and enabled the Sith Lord Nefarid to kill him.
